sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Content = ({ name }) => { return (

{name}

Thoughs are dark dark caves which you fall in Initally which thought you are thinking need some concisious efforts Some caves(thoughts) are provoking some are uninterest you. Evaluate thoughts same like actions for example drinking alocohol make give you pleasure for temporary but long term it affect your health. Similarly thoughts caves are alike. Some thoughts are provoking some are not

Think conciously where it is going to lead you for example memory of someone who is not going to bring any fruit in your day Initially it may be because of place/thing but it could lead to no where. Inspect these thoughts at initial period and alert your conciousness about it and divert /stop yourself falling for it. Similar it with actions.

Disciplined Actions are actions which make you different from common people. We know that, If you want to excel in software industry you have to study ,make project , learn architecture etc but we did it whenever our mind tell us to do it.

Rarely for sometime will may bring fruit but for below avg fruit. Second Trap of these incident impact us by comparing with others excelling in this field. Discilpline your thoughts discipline your actions and have specific time for it.

Pray on time ,sleep eat wake on time this might seem pretty boring and uncle type routine but this is what make you different from below average people Scrolling reels wont add anything in your memory similarly watching tutorials of aws may dont add anything but 1% can be beneficial instead of former.

); }; export default Content;
